sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import NavbarComp from '../Navbar/NavbarComp' import { createAxios, getTokenFromLocalStorage } from '../../Hooks/UseAxios' import styled from 'styled-components/macro' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' const ErrorBox = styled.div` height: 30px; margin: 1rem 0; /* border: 1px solid red; */ color: red; width: 100%; padding: 2px 0; text-align: center; ` const Container = styled.section` /* border: 1px solid olive; */ max-width: 1000px; margin: 0 auto; box-sizing: border-box; @media (max-width: 500px) { width: 95%; } ` const Wrapper = styled.section` /* background-color:red; */ min-height: 90vh; padding-top: 5rem; ` const Footer = styled.footer` background-color: #212529; height: 3.6vh; width: 100%; ` export default function UserDetails() { const navigate = useNavigate() const token = getTokenFromLocalStorage() const [error, setError] = useState(false) const [errorMessage, setErrorMessage] = useState('') const [getUsers, setGetUsers] = useState({ userFirstName: '', userLastName: '', aadharNumber: '', emailId: '', phoneNumber: '', gender: '', accountNumber: '', typeOfAccount: '', bankId: '', }) const [username, setUserName] = useState('') //check user role const user = localStorage.getItem('user') const parsedUser = JSON.parse(user) //console.log(parsedUser) const userRole = parsedUser?.user?.role[0]?.roleName useEffect(() => { if (!user || userRole !== 'Admin') { navigate('/') } }, [userRole]) const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (!username) { setError(true) setErrorMessage('Fields cannot be empty!') return } const token = parsedUser.jwtToken const apiUrl = 'http://localhost:8080' const authAxios = createAxios(apiUrl, token) const getUser = await authAxios.get(`/users/${username}`) setGetUsers(getUser?.data) console.log(getUser?.data) if (getUser?.data) { setError(false) setErrorMessage('') } else { setGetUsers({ userFirstName: '', userLastName: '', aadharNumber: '', emailId: '', phoneNumber: '', gender: '', typeOfAccount: '', dateOfBirth: '', accountNumber: '', bankName: '', bankId: '', }) setError(true) setErrorMessage('User not found!') } } const handleUpdate = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() if ( !getUsers.userFirstName || !getUsers.userLastName || !getUsers.userName || !getUsers.userPassword || !getUsers.aadharNumber || !getUsers.emailId || !getUsers.phoneNumber || !getUsers.gender || !getUsers.typeOfAccount ) { setError(true) setErrorMessage('Fields cannot be empty!') return } else if (!username) { setError(true) setErrorMessage('Enter username first!') return } else { const token = parsedUser.jwtToken const apiUrl = 'http://localhost:8080' const authAxios = createAxios(apiUrl, token) const getUser = await authAxios.put( `/updateprofile/${username}`, getUsers ) setGetUsers({ userFirstName: '', userLastName: '', aadharNumber: '', emailId: '', phoneNumber: '', gender: '', typeOfAccount: '', dateOfBirth: '', accountNumber: '', bankName: '', bankId: '', }) } } return ( <>
Username setUserName(e.target.value)} /> {error && errorMessage}
setGetUsers({ ...getUsers, userFirstName: e.target.value }) } />
setGetUsers({ ...getUsers, userLastName: e.target.value }) } />
setGetUsers({ ...getUsers, aadharNumber: e.target.value }) } />
setGetUsers({ ...getUsers, phoneNumber: e.target.value }) } />
setGetUsers({ ...getUsers, gender: e.target.value }) } />
setGetUsers({ ...getUsers, typeOfAccount: e.target.value }) } />
) }
